attributes.action: to remove all school uniforms in all public schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think that children should not be made to wear a school uniform an should be allowed 2 wear what they want and as they wish because it is not fair telling children what to wear when adults are free 2 wear what they what and as they wish so i think the uniform should be banned so that everyone in our nation is the same and children are made to fell like they are goin 2 jail not school because they all are they same and they also dont feel like they can not be them selves because they can not dress how they fell like so they are the reason why i feel that there should be no uniforn in all public schools

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
